data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Evgeniy Kukulyak signals a Ural Yekaterinburg throw-in in Tambov's half.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Tambov in the half of Ural Yekaterinburg.
Throw-in for Tambov close to the penalty box.
Tambov to take a throw-in in Ural Yekaterinburg territory.
In the minute 3, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Can Ural Yekaterinburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tambov's half?
Evgeniy Kukulyak signals a free kick to Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
In the minute 8, Ural Yekaterinburg have been awarded a corner by Evgeniy Kukulyak.
Free kick for Ural Yekaterinburg in the half of Tambov.
Can Ural Yekaterinburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tambov's half?
In the minute 12, Evgeniy Kukulyak awards Ural Yekaterinburg a goal kick.
Tambov to take a throw-in in Ural Yekaterinburg territory.
Goal kick for Ural Yekaterinburg at Central Stadium.
In the minute 14, Free kick for Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
Tambov awarded a free kick in their own half.
Pogrebnyak Pavel (Ural Yekaterinburg) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 16, Ball goes out of play for a Ural Yekaterinburg goal kick.
Mikhail Kostyukov (Tambov) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Tambov.
In the minute 18, Tambov drives forward and Oleksandr Kaplienko gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Tambov.
Throw-in high up the field for Tambov in Ekaterinburg.
In the minute 19, Ural Yekaterinburg have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Tambov at Central Stadium.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 21, Throw-in for Ural Yekaterinburg in the half of Tambov.
Ural Yekaterinburg will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Tambov.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Ekaterinburg.
In the minute 25, Evgeniy Kukulyak signals a Ural Yekaterinburg throw-in in Tambov's half.
Evgeniy Kukulyak signals a Tambov throw-in in Ural Yekaterinburg's half.
Ural Yekaterinburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 26, Free kick Tambov.
Ural Yekaterinburg's Vyacheslav Podberezkin has been booked in Ekaterinburg.
Free kick for Tambov in their own half.
In the minute 28, In Ekaterinburg a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Can Tambov get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ural Yekaterinburg's half?
Tambov have been awarded a corner by Evgeniy Kukulyak.
Soslan Takazov is back on the pitch.
In the minute 31, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Soslan Takazov for Tambov who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Evgeniy Kukulyak signals a free kick to Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
In the minute 33, Ball safe as Ural Yekaterinburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Tambov in the half of Ural Yekaterinburg.
Evgeniy Kukulyak signals a free kick to Tambov.
In the minute 35, Ural Yekaterinburg's Andrey Egorychev gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Tambov defender.
Evgeniy Kukulyak signals a throw-in for Ural Yekaterinburg, close to Tambov's area.
Ural Yekaterinburg to take a throw-in in Tambov territory.
In the minute 37, Throw-in Tambov.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ural Yekaterinburg needs to be cautious. Tambov have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 38, Throw-in for Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
Ural Yekaterinburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Central Stadium, Branko Jovicic has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 40, Tambov awarded a free kick in their own half.
Evgeniy Kukulyak awards the away team a throw-in.
Ural Yekaterinburg have a goal kick.
In the minute 42, Free kick Ural Yekaterinburg.
Evgeniy Kukulyak signals a free kick to Ural Yekaterinburg just outside Tambov's area.
Eric Bicfalvi for Ural Yekaterinburg gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 44, Goal kick for Tambov at Central Stadium.
Can Ural Yekaterinburg capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 45, Evgeniy Kukulyak will wait an extra 1 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Vladimir Rykov (Ural Yekaterinburg) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Ball goes out of play for a Tambov goal kick.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Central Stadium.
Oleksandr Kaplienko for Tambov has been booked by Evgeniy Kukulyak and receives a first yellow card.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Ural Yekaterinburg have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 49, Free kick for Ural Yekaterinburg in the half of Tambov.
Vladimir Rykov (Ural Yekaterinburg) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Ural Yekaterinburg have been awarded a corner by Evgeniy Kukulyak.
In the minute 51, Evgeniy Kukulyak awards Tambov a goal kick.
Pogrebnyak Pavel for Ural Yekaterinburg drives towards goal at Central Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Evgeniy Kukulyak signals a Tambov throw-in in Ural Yekaterinburg's half.
In the minute 54, At Central Stadium, Valeriu Ciuperca for the away team has been yellow-carded. He will miss the next match due to a suspension!
Evgeniy Kukulyak signals a free kick to Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Soslan Takazov.
In the minute 56, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Tambov in their own half.
Soslan Takazov returns to the field for Tambov after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 58, Ural Yekaterinburg are in shooting range from this free kick.
In Ekaterinburg Ural Yekaterinburg attack through Eric Bicfalvi. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Ekaterinburg.
In the minute 60, Throw-in for Ural Yekaterinburg at Central Stadium.
Tambov have a goal kick.
Free kick for Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
In the minute 61, Tambov's Anton Kilin breaks free at Central Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Evgeniy Kukulyak awards Ural Yekaterinburg a goal kick.
Danijel Miskic of Ural Yekaterinburg gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 62, It's a goal kick for the away team in Ekaterinburg.
Can Tambov get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ural Yekaterinburg's half?
Throw-in Tambov.
In the minute 66, Throw-in for Ural Yekaterinburg in the half of Tambov.
Corner awarded to Ural Yekaterinburg.
Vladimir Rykov is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 67, Play has been interrupted briefly in Ekaterinburg to check on Oleksandr Kaplienko, who is grimacing with pain.
Tambovâ€™s Oleksandr Kaplienko is on his feet again at Central Stadium.
Ural Yekaterinburg's Vladimir Rykov looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 72, In Ekaterinburg Ural Yekaterinburg's Eric Bicfalvi is caught offside.
Ball safe as Ural Yekaterinburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Tambov to take a throw-in in Ural Yekaterinburg territory.
In the minute 73, Evgeniy Kukulyak signals a free kick to Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
Aleksey Evseev is on a sub for Vyacheslav Podberezkin for Ural Yekaterinburg.
Tambov awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 75, Can Tambov get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ural Yekaterinburg's half?
Evgeniy Kukulyak signals a free kick to Tambov.
Nikolay Zolotov (Ural Yekaterinburg) has received a yellow card from Evgeniy Kukulyak.
In the minute 78, Aleksey Evseev (Ural Yekaterinburg) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in for Tambov in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Tambov goal kick.
Evgeniy Kukulyak signals a free kick to Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
In the minute 79, The home team replace Pogrebnyak Pavel with Andrey Panyukov.
The home team have replaced Branko Jovicic with Rafal Augustyniak. This is the third substitution made today by Yuriy Matveev.
In the minute 80, Tambov awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Ekaterinburg a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ural Yekaterinburg's Vladimir Rykov has been booked in Ekaterinburg and will miss the next match through suspension.
In the minute 82, Can Ural Yekaterinburg capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Tambov's half?
Tambov to take a throw-in in Ural Yekaterinburg territory.
Throw-in for Tambov in the half of Ural Yekaterinburg.
In the minute 84, Goal kick for Ural Yekaterinburg at Central Stadium.
Free kick for Tambov in their own half.
Tambov awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 87, Evgeniy Kukulyak signals a Ural Yekaterinburg throw-in in Tambov's half.
Evgeniy Kukulyak awards the home team a throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Tambov goal kick.
In the minute 89, Tambov make their first substitution with Vitali Shakhov replacing Anton Kilin.
At Central Stadium the fourth official shows that 5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Evgeniy Kukulyak signals a free kick to Tambov in their own half.
Corner awarded to Tambov.
Throw-in Tambov.
Evgeniy Kukulyak awards Tambov a goal kick.
Ural Yekaterinburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's 0-0 as the referee blows for full-time.
Danijel Miskic (Ural Yekaterinburg) has been booked and will miss the next match due to a suspension.
Mohammed Rabiu is replacing Pavel Karasev for the away team.
Sergey Ryzhikov is booked for the away team.
At Central Stadium, German Onugha has been yellow-carded for the away team.
